about_the_game:
You did it everyone! We heard you loud and clear - Click Click Dig will be a premium game. There will not be any in-app purchases. Pay once, play for as long you want!

DIGGERS!



Recruit a zany cast of diggers to help you reach the core of each planet in this Idle Mining Game!

POSITION BONUSES!



Mine strategically! Position characters to take advantage of powerful stat bonuses. Characters have a stat type that gets boosted when they're on a bonus block. They also apply bonuses to different patterns of blocks. Change the layout to boost the stats you want!

SKINS!



Every digger has multiple unlockable skins. Each skin gives an immediate, permanent bonus just for owning it. There are tons to choose from, so pick your favorite and get digging!

MINING!



Every planet has a unique ore to mine. Refine the ore into materials, then use them to craft powerful items that provide stat boosts.

QUESTS!



Go on clicker quests, collect ingredients, craft unique items, and help out your furry (and sometimes scaly, hairy, slimy, or feathery) friends. Unlock special digger skins and create an unstoppable collection of characters.

And much more:
⛏️ research digging
⛏️ clicker gameplay
⛏️ tasks
⛏️ incremental progression
⛏️ benefactors
⛏️ idle progression
⛏️ planet shops
⛏️ challenge mode
⛏️ golden worms
⛏️ offline mining modes
⛏️ geode prizes
⛏️ treasure chests
⛏️ big bangs!

JOIN OUR DISCORD

name: Click Click Dig: Idle Mine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, or 11
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Click Click Dig is an idle mining game that lets you dig deep into the core of several planets. Complete quests, unlock unique character skins, compete in challenges, upgrade planets - the choice is yours!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
